comments.text:
(In reply to comment #7)
> A /minimized/ testcase that displays the problem would be nice.
> 
Sorry, my first bug report.  I did cut it down considerably from the original file, I have well over 50 categories on the left menu.  I pulled the generated html code from view source and removed most of the categories and a bunch of the returned rows from the selected category.
